Description.Text: Location The hotel is located approximately 1.8 km from the town centre, where guests will find entertainment and leisure facilities. It is only a few kilometres from the airport. Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 125 rooms. A lobby and a reception are available to travellers. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a café, a bar and a playroom. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Children can have a great time playing in the playground. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the resort. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. The standard features of most rooms include a balcony. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. A safe and a minibar are also available. Guests will also find a mini fridge included as standard. Internet access, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Rooms suitable for wheelchair access are bookable. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Sports/Entertainment The complex features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Travellers can enjoy a range of refreshing drinks at the poolside bar. Tennis and beach volleyball are available to active guests. Sport and leisure facilities at the holiday complex include a gym, table tennis and billiards. A wellness area with a sauna, massage treatments and a solarium is available at the accommodation. Entertainment facilities include a kids' club. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the resort: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
